reviews.review: крутая игруха
不挂vpn根本搜不到人 好评的有很多都是水军。特别是那些游戏时间不超过2小时de

玩了几个小时，特意来评价。游戏是个好游戏，可玩性不错。但目前为止有好几个问题没有处理。
1--修改存档，20段的3级人类4个天赋，还有两个是红色（极度稀有）的天赋。 这叫我的小屠夫情何以堪！！！
2--恶意挂机 ，隐身屠杀了3个人，剩下的人猫起来不开发电机，不移动。MD，火起来和他对耗了20分钟。实在是耗不起直接GG，然后一毛钱的奖励也没有拿到。
3--CE加速， 目前只碰到一例这种事情，妈蛋电锯屠夫一路狂飙到身边连杀3人，玩个蛋蛋啊！！！

Очень интересный геймплей!

Игра на 3 -4 дня. Карт мало, фпс жутко низкий, баги, телепорты из-за пинга. Геймплей однообразный. Вы делаете одно и тоже что за маньяка, что за жертв - надоедает быстро. В целом идея понравилась, буду терпеть сея ущемления.

最大的缺点就是想玩屠夫但开一次大厅要等太长!
再就是缺乏匹配模式,不能 随机选择 当屠夫还是当人类.
但还是给创意一个推荐吧.
紧张刺激，是我对这个游戏的看法。低端局逃生者合作性差，略显无聊，段位提升之后游戏乐趣会明显提高。但是很多人不知是为了段位，还是有一颗玻璃心，经常在游戏逆风局势时断网。受影响最大是屠夫被戏耍后的断网，非常影响其他人的游戏体验，希望之后能在技术上避免这种情况。
И так, что же мы имеем? Правильно, мать разработчиков.

While I only played this game shortly, I feel that they lacked creativity and design overall in the game. The setting is small but doesn't make a lot of sense. In fact, I feel this is a knock off of the idea of  the game Damned, except the maps do not change. 
- The graphics are nice but nothing special considering the small size.
- The controls are easy to pick up......extremely simple.
- The sounds are set.
- The characters look is decent.

However the following is all that needs to be fixed/currently broken which is what you are buying now regardless of its current stage.
- The killer's wipe down of the blade after each attack is not only annoying but retarded in the sense that...why? Since it takes multiple hits to hurt someone critically, you are forced to go half speed while wiping down the blade before you are allowed to return to normal speed. It shows lack of creativity/design. 
- Control movements when interacting with the environment(pushing down the numerous crates and barriers) is non fluent and all movements similiar to this are the same. There is no chance for this fail, different style of it, etc.
- Takes you 2 seconds to stick someone up on the spike but takes the people half of a second to get them down regardless of how long they are up on the stick. This again seems to be a lack of creativity not to mention really bad design. Being stabbed multiple times and they are able to get away at half speed. 
- The crashing of this game is about 3/5 chances as the killer. This means the game is over and 0 xp. Way to high!
- No XP for playing with friends.
- Match making is horrific
- Skills? Why?
- Paid beta test of this game with the devs not listening to the community.

This is the best survival horror game that I have played in my entire life!
The feeling of the killer always stalking you is so well done that it feels like you are in an old 80 slasher movie.

I hope that the developers will see this because I want to tell them that they made an awesome game.

Отличная игра. Пару лет назад была актуальна, сейчас бы уже не кому не посоветовал ее покупать.
Многие студии пытались сделать игры в таком жанре, но они все все были провальны, но эта игра стала исключением.

Из минусов могу отметить:
- эта игра невероятно долго развивалась, хоть полноценной игрой она стала недавно, но ее актуальность на 2019 полностью пропала.
-как бы вам не хотелось, но игра принуждает  покупать DLC пачками.
Nice Game
Отличный и веселый "Survival Horror" с элементами прокачки перков.

Игра сговнилась. Сплошное кемперство. Нет, я не бегаю с фонариком и присаживаюсь, когда сбрасываю поддон на маньяка. Я играл за убийцу, но больше нравиться играть за выживших. за маньяка можно спокойно убить всю команду не стоя у крюка и не наворачивая круги вокруг него, не сидеть за свинью под крюком, не стоять у рюка за Майкла на 3 стадии, за Фредди, за Билии, пупса с пилой и за любого маньяка, котрый есть и выйдет в дальнейшим. Я с беты играю эту игру (забрасывал на долго, но заходил, когда выходила обнова), и скорее всего может наплыв школоты из говнафейса или майна, которые не понимают в чем заключается игра (не просто так перки для выживших, которые помогают спасти сурва с крюка и вылечить его по-быстрей и много других бонусов) или создателям насрать, они ввели дох*я DLC, рубят с них бабло, ведь маньяков много в игре, они уже наплакались, нарыдались разрабам, что их обижают сурвы, они же такие сильные, их догнать не реально. Играешь ты за маньяка, ну повесил на крюк сурва, ну нахрена фармить очки кемперством? Игра умрет, т.к. это надоест многим. Не советую покупать игры от этих разрабов, т.к. много кампаний, которые зарабатывают создавая игру и потом просто забрасывают ее. Бабла срубили - збс. Го делать новую. И ее забросим. Х*йней полнейшей становится игра. Кому-то и в кайф побегать до того момента, как вас насадят на крюк, а другой сурв, не смотря, что рядом кемпер, снимет вам, чтобы вас снова пизд*нули и повесили, а потом и вашего спасителя. Это мое мнение. Если нравиться - играйте. А по мне - пусть лучше 9 из 10 матчей попадются про маньяки, чем кемперы.

游戏是好游戏，再怎么萌新，慢慢练好了也会变得熟练起来，至少不会被人虐哭，但是一局只要有一个开外挂的微调孤儿狗，整天
的游戏体验就毁了，最关键的是，这游戏从上架开始被外挂恶心到弃坑，直到现在回坑，仍然有不少孤儿依然逍遥法外，这种非对
称性性的竞技游戏，本身就没有什么公平性而言，还非得使用各种外挂，使得不公平的一方变得更不公平，我真的很想知道，这种
情况下，那些挂壁们真该用脑子想想，哪个傻B会陪你玩？除了什么都搞不清楚的萌新外，你觉得能骗几个人？萌新们也该注意了，
除非你用护士长不用技能直接跑着追人，否者其他所有屠夫的位移速度永远比人类快，那些平坦地形上，莫名其妙跑的比你还要快
的，全是挂壁，全是挂壁，全是孤儿！看到这情况直接退出当局，没必要和他们气下去，和谐游戏环境除了靠官方（真不靠谱），
剩下的只有靠我们自己，掉豆就掉豆，谁他妈给你们这群孤儿嗨皮，吔屎啦

Very interesting and addictive game, I wish it will get more players soon :) 
The only bad thing I would like to highlight is ''balance''. I know that this game is new and came literally 2 weeks ago, thats why I am writing this hint for Behaviour Digital. For the Wraith (killer) I advise you to fix his bell or instead do something with him :) For others it would be better if u decrease the range when survivors can hear their hearthbeats. And in my own opinion I think that Meg (survival) has got advantage in surviving, coz of her Spring Burst (perk) and thats why I or even We, killers, cant catch her) Do not think that I am just rushing towards her, no, I am even using my tactical skills and it does not help) For other survivals I advise you to add additional percentage to their unique skills, for example Botany Knowledge (Claudette Perk), increase from 10% to 15% or even to 20% at the first level. And at the end I would like to emphasize a small amout of clothes for each character, just add few more and you will increase amount of happy faces in the game) Read others reviews, buy and join us in this beatiful game and Have Fun!
-Also add button ''upgrade to Deluxe Edition'' in the store, I really want to get it coz at the beginning I did not expect this game so exciting and beatiful in terms of textures. Or let me request a refund and I will buy Deluxe Edition)

挺好玩的，就是感觉屠夫开始太强了，人类等级高了才开始能够压制屠夫。

***EDIT***


Came back about 2 months ago. Cant say enough about how much better the game is. Still some DC's but they have a system to give the killer some points when they do.

***Initial response***


First, the game is fun and does live up to what you would expect. From the first game to the 20th you will be jumping every time you hear a noise or make one.

Second, unfortunatly the ranked system has led to survivors DC'ing the second they get caught so that they don't go down in rank. THIS SUCKS. It sucks for survivors cause if anyone else gets caught they are just gone and not waisting valuble time, and because you can't rescue them. It sucks as a Killer cause you instantly lose points. 

Would love to be able to suggest this game to my friends but because of this major issue I can't :(

6.5/10 but could be so much more!

I'm fully redoing my steam review here.

Since the game's launch, it has received many improvements and killers over the years.  So, after all this time, how does the game fare now?

Awful.

Killers and survivors both have aspects of their gameplay that make it infuriating to play.  Killers can punish individual survivors heavily with unfun, scummy play, that is actively encouraged by the Devs and has been a problem since its Beta launch six years ago.  Survivors who are coordinated have way too much control of a match, and minor mistakes in these matches can spell most of it for you before you even complete your first hook.  Survivors who aren't coordinated can have a troubled time even getting half the gens done, and versus a strong killer that can spell disaster for you.

I've played the game on-and-off since 2016 to see if it improves over the years.  Many things have improved, but there are several issues; Tunneling, Camping, Hackers, Rewarding Scummy Play and Punishing Fun Play.  The game has eroded over time.  Acquiring high-end licenses and continually releasing content to keep its player count high, but as soon as it hits a peak, the dips right back down.  Its kept this steady pace, due to players like me who return to see the new content, then be hastily reminded why I uninstalled in the first place; you can make the hardest, best plays in the world as a survivor, but if your team is twiddling their thumbs you die and drop in the MMR.  If you're a killer and you play fair and hook every survivor once or twice, gens get done and they all escape, and you drop in MMR.

The Devs themselves seem to be on a right track but are missing a key drive to alter some fundamental aspects of the game that keep it locked down for people like me.  That being, unfun design and mechanics.  Some of these are unintentional, like facecamping, but many of these are intentional, such as Dead Hard, a common complaint from the community since its release, and has yet to be fixed for many years.

If this is the rate of release for content in the game, its no wonder why the player count is dropping again.

I really hope some sweeping changes to the unfun mechanics of the game are done.  With the introduction of 'skill based' matchmaking, which as said above, rewards scummy play and highlights the issues in the game.

I've given the Devs the benefit of the doubt for years.  I've handed to them hundreds of hours of my time.  But it only felt like I had more bad matches than good ones.  And by good ones, I don't mean ones where I stomped.  I mean matches where I actually had fun.

Fun in this game isn't given.  It has to be sought after, and in a game as frustrating as this, where minor mistakes can spell out the end of a match, I don't see why I should spend my time looking for fun here when I can go to other games for more fun.
Good and addictive game!

Honestly, 
   The first while playing with friends can actually be really fun. Learning the maps, killers, Items, etc, is actually enjoyable for a while. After some time they kept adding more and more making it extremely difficult to play the game casually.  At this point the game is so polluted with over zealous killers and perks that unless you play very consistently it can be difficult to just enjoy the game. Not to say some people wont still love the grind, but it is very unforgiving and can become frustrating quickly.

Update 2: La autentica salud.

Actualización:

En su día (cuando salió) solicité un reembolso del juego, debido a los problemas que comentaba en el analisis de abajo. He de decir que después de casi dos años el juego si que mola. Con sus carencias y demás, pero me está resultando muy divertido. No se cuanto durará la diversión, pero pillandolo por 6 pavos como lo he pillado es más que recomendable, si te interesa la tematica.

Pros: Es muy original, las partidas son rápidas y divertidas. Es muy diferente jugar de asesino o de superviviente.

Contras: Podría resultar repetitivo (a mi hasta el momento no, pero no llevo tanto jugado). Los jodidos DLCS, manda cojones la politica de DLCs de esta empresa... muy mal poder jugar solo con 4 asesinos y 5 supervivientes con el juego base.



LAS VENTANAS: EL ENEMIGO NATURAL DE UN PSICOPATA SLASHER...

La ídea del juego es interesante, los gráficos aunque algo cutres pueden pasar, el sonido esta bien... pero hay detalles de la jugabilidad que echan a perder el título. Y repercuten especialmente en la inmersión en el mismo. Por ejemplo: 

- Como asesino, la torpeza y lentitud de la cinematica cruzando ventanas hará que muchas veces cazar a los supervivientes sea tremendamente estupido. Si el supervivente en cuestión ha jugado mas de 2 horas sabrá perfectamente como darte coba continuamente simplemente cruzando una ventana.... Y claro, toda sensación de ser el malo de peli slasher que provoca pavor desaparece al ver lo tremendamente gilipo*as que pareces mientras que los supervivientes estan riendose de ti mientras que cruzan la misma pu*a ventana una y otra vez. Al final, ellos son los que estan jugando contigo...

- Como superviviente las cosas son más pasables. Quitaría la vista en 3ª persona, la sustituiría por alguna otra ventaja. Que cuando te metas en un armario se quede la cámara fuera tambien corta el rollo... pero bueno...

Experiencia de juego:

4 partidas, 2 como superviviente y 2 como asesino. En las 2 como superviviente he escapado bastante facilmente, sin practicar salto de ventana. En las 2 como asesino, he perseguido como un gilipoyas a gente que jugaba conmigo, y una de las veces despuesd e esperar 10 min. para que se uniesen los 4 jipis. No voy a jugar más porque voy a solicitar reembolso.

A no ser que los desarrolladores se pongan a tope a mejorar y sacar contenido, la gente empezará a aburrirse pronto, porque las opciones son bastante limitadas y no parece que haga falta mucho tiempo para dominarlo totalmente. No tiene modo un jugador, para iniciar una partida hace falta que esten los 5... y no puedes jugar con amigos a no ser que sea una partida privada (para la que imagino que habrá que llenar tb los 5 huecos).

Dead by Daylight - это, когда игра за жертву находится за 5 секунд, а за убийцу гребаные 30 минут?!
Dead by Daylight - это, когда ты заводишь один генератор целых 10 минут.
Dead by Daylight - это, когда ты не можешь задеть полоску в круге.
Dead by Daylight - это, когда все мертвы, а ты боишься выйти из шкафа.
Dead by Daylight - это, когда ты спас друга с крюка, но попал на его место.
Dead by Daylight - это, когда твоего школьного английского хватает для понимания всего происходящего в игре.
Dead by Daylight - это, когда ты исследуешь аптечку туеву хучу раз.
Dead by Daylight - это, когда ты еще ни разу не играл за убийцу.
Dead by Daylight - это, ты не можешь отыскать генератор, зато находишь убийцу.
Dead by Daylight - это, когда Пятница 13 уже не нужна.
Dead by Daylight - это, когда ты второй раз попадаешь на крюк и пути назад уже нет.
Dead by Daylight - это, когда удар бензопилой оставляет твое туловище целым.
Dead by Daylight - это, когда неведомая хуетаа забирает тебя с крюка к праотцам.

게임 자체는 상당히 재미있는 편입니다. 다만 아직 업데이트나 개선해야 할 부분들이 많이 있습니다.

우선, 게임을 하던 도중 crack이 발생하였다고 하면서 게임이 꺼졌습니다.

그 이후로 접속이 계속 되질 않아서 지우고 다시 깔아보았더니 레벨이랑 랭크 등 모든 것이 초기화되어 있었습니다....

오류로 접속이 된 것인지 알 수 없다는 단점이 있습니다.

우선적으로는 각종 버그들을 수정하고 나서 강제종료에 대한 패널티로 랭크를 다운시킨다던지

블러드포인트를 마이너스로 한다던지 하는 방안을 만들어야 할 것입니다.

게임 자체는 재미있습니다.

HOLY CRAP GET THIS GAME!!!!!!!!!!!! It is actually scary every time you play and builds up tension amazingly. This is great becuase ITS ALL MULTIPLAYER!! I am vetran horror player and this is a scary game. I've played Outlast, Amnesia etc and I truly recommend it. If your worried about having no friends to play with dont be. It is so easy to get into a game and it is super great. It has top notch graphics and sound design and an EPIC MUSICICAL SCORE!!! All the maps are diffirent EVERY TIME. They are generated every time. You will also feel like hero when you save one of your teammates or do somthing brave like distract the killer or somthing. It also has great character progression and upgrades. Also the game is very very well balenced. The most well balanced game ive seen. It's hard to play both sides and shows how well balenced it is. It's not hardcore or anything you will learn things. Also being the KILLER IS SO MUCH FUN. Its everything you'd hope being a killer would be. I truly truly truly recommend this game. 263536267/10
Fun game, But broken mechanics, needs fixing.
I only have 2 friends that have this game, why the hell isn't there a way to join as a group of like 2 or 3?

Best horror game i seen that really bends your mind and how you should play the horror game. Its receiving a bad reviews because i cant stand technical errors such as but not limited to visual bugs where you should be able to see something such as generators or friends on hooks but unable to. Im also afraid this game has a number of hackers who have the abilities to see through objects and allow themselves to rapidly attack if they are the killer even if you check to see if they had some sort of perk or advantage in anyway when they had none. 

There is also one major game flaw thats not a bug but is poorly designed, the ranking/point system. First off the ranking system is based off how "well" you survive like turning on generator and unhooking people; the killer for how many hooks and chasing. The purpose was to make sure survivors did not just afk hide while there teamates do all the work and they get a free win. What was not considered however was people leaving the game which causes a huge wreck for both survior and the killer. For the survior, if a player leaves even if its at the start of the game you still must get the same amount of generators, the math of the generator and survior count is this
4players=5generators
3players=4generators
2players=3generators
only player=2generators
it has a proportion system in case you wish to play with your friends (which btw you can only do in a private match)
This is problematic because now there is only 3 players that have to get 5 generators which is not designed for and makes it so much harder for the survivors and there is ZERO litteraly ZERO compensation for this in any way for anyone and more likely you will be demoted.

The killer is arguably worst; lets imagine a scenario, you are really good as the killer and you are hooking people left and right, and now people dont want to play that match anymore and quit. What happens? if the killer hooks someone, and that person leaves the game while hooked, the killer gets ZERO POINTS FOR HOOKING. How does this affect the killer? well less points means you cant be promoted and guess what? If just ONE thats right just ONE survivor leaves, the killer cant get enough points even if he gets the rest of the survivors and ends up being demoted no matter what he does. The killer loses points and actually gets demoted for people quiting.

Now what happens if the killer quits? some games the survivors outplay the killer really well and can make the killer quit and basically the survivors are about to win the game, now the killer leaves because he does not like being outplayed guess what happens? the survivors dont finish the game and dont get a win game bonus or escape bonus or anything that would be dealt with winning a game. 

With all of that you gain less Bloodpoints which you can use to upgrade your characters (you can use bloodpoints gained from one charcter and use it on another) so its a pain.

Now you want to know whats the worst of it? THIS IS ABUSABLE BY THE FAREST EXTENT. Heres how; your the survivor, your about to die and you want the killer to pay for it? leave the game he gets less points; your the killer and about to lose to many survivors? leave the game they wont gain an escape bonus. This is appalling and needs to be fixed immediatly.

The ranking system does not provide any sort of apparent advantage but for competitive people such as myself and others dont like being cheated out of our ranks but it does not matter due to horrible matching 
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=716669710
Why is the killer rank so high and has all these perks while none of the survivors have very low ranks and no similar advantage? its not like this normally and this shouldnt happen at all.
A game so good i feel Dead by Daylight sometimes hahahahah. alright jumps off cliff,

If I had to explain this game with one word it would have to be "nervouscited." Playing as the survivors is a paranoia fest if you dont know what your doing and especially when you botch a skill check but juking the killer is always a thrill. On the flip side of things not having a clue where those pesky survivors are or what they could be up to is irksome but once you have them in your sight there's no greater thrill of the chase. Unless they get away....but when they dont its oh so good. (Damn those pesky flashlights btw. Pain to use and a bigger pain if your the monster.) I will admit though playing against higher ranked monster or survivors with rare perks is a bit lopsided and could use some tweaks or limiters for playing with people of similar skill. If such a thing already exists then it needs work or the leveling system needs to be more lax so everyone can have some kind of edge.

Жду обнову хотя бы чего потому что эта шляпа работает хуже моего соседа алкаша Геннадия (а он между прочим инвалид)

In this game you play as a sexy generator repairman just trying to make the daily rounds. You can play as White Guy, Asian Guy, White Girl, or Black Girl. One day one of the extras for the Scooby-Doo live movie gets really pissed off and starts chasing you and your fellow repairmen around. Don't let him put you on his meathooks, or...uh... I guess you die. I couldn't think of anything creative for that.

Would recommend. Rank system is bad but it'll likely be fixed soon enough.

I think it would be cool if there was a perk for the killers that they could catch the crates that the survivors can pull down on you!! But overall amazingly fun and scary game!!

This game reminds me of Depth, which is why I'm not recommending it.

The progression trees feel like a very ham-handed way to keep you invested in the game. I had to lose 4-5 times before I could get a flashlight. On top of that, there are individual progression trees for each character. Really, why would I have to earn/spend nearly 20000 points just to get a [i]flashlight[/i] for each survivor character?? In a co-op/vs horror game no less?

Speaking of co-op, there's absolutely no way to communicate in-game. No 'walkie talkie' mic chat, no 'texting' type chat. There is a lobby chat, so you can know which people say "No man left behind"- and proceed to hide near the escape hatch while everyone else is turning on generators and dying.

There's only one game mode. You can have plenty of maps, characters, items- but after a while, only one gamemode is gonna get boring as all getout. Not to mention this one gamemode is incredibly convoluted and tedious. As a survivor, you have to perform a 'stop the spinning dial in the right place' minigame in order to activate several generators; mess up the minigame and you'll have your ears blown out by the generator exploding in your face. 

If only the explosion killed you. 

Instead, the killer is alerted to your location. And you as a survivor have to decide where and when you should run. You're pretty much dead if the monster is anywhere within 5-10 meters away from you, so you're safest bet is to constantly [strike]run[/strike]walk and hide in a closet or crouch behind something and remain still. Repeat this until every generator is activated.

Sound fun yet? 

Getting chased by the killer is terrifying for the first 3-4 times before you realise he's just an errand boy for some lovecraftian spider-legs.  The killer doesn't really do much killing, sad to say. No executions, no mutilation, he just slings you over his shoulder and throws you onto a hook.

This game has mechanics that allow you to help each other escape from the monster. However, the fact that killers use injured players literally as hooked-bait means that helping each other is a surefire way to get yourself killed.
almayın aq oyun sahtekar çıktı oyuna girince korkunçlu karı çıkıyo
Awesome game
Game is good. Theres a couple of issue currently that are being addressed currently. Apart from that, the greatest asymmetrical multiplayer game ive ever played.

Afortunadamente, después de años, el juego mejoró en muchos aspectos, por lo que cambió mi review a positiva. Es un juego divertido para jugar con amigos, si jugas como superviviente te tiene que tocar un asesino decente, porque si es camper, la partida se torna muy aburrida.

I've played at least 20 matches and have not been able to escape once. Although this may seem shallow, I don't think the game is really playable for the survivors, as the only advantage they have is in numbers. The killer has the entire map at his disposal, and his hieghtened senses make stealth a lost cause.
The "Tech Tree" is lost on me, because most of the discriptions are vague, and at the beginning of a match random techs or items show up for a split second before you can get the chance to hover over them and read what perks they give you.

All in all, even though it was on sale, I regret this purchase deeply.

Dead by Daylight - это когда в команде 4 человека, но каждый сам за себя 
Dead by Daylight - это когда ты помогаешь союзнику выбраться из капкана, а в итоге маньяк ловит тебя и вешает на крюк вместо него 
Dead by Daylight - это когда ты умираешь на крюке, а союзники в это время ремонтируют генераторы 
Dead by Daylight - это когда ты ремонтируешь последний генератор, а союзник, убегающий от маньяка, приводит его прямо к тебе, и маньяк бежит уже не за ним, а за тобой 
Dead by Daylight - это когда твое сердцебиение повышается одновременно с сердцебиением персонажа 
Dead by Daylight - это когда ты с оружием идешь убивать хейтеров (которых у тебя нет на YouTube, но ты прекрасно воображаешь их в лице игроков) 
Dead by Daylight - это когда от маньяка можно убежать делая безумные петли по дороге 
Dead by Daylight - это когда бегущий прямо - рак, нуб, новичок 
Dead by Daylight - это когда маньяку необходим двойник, которого нет, ибо ворот для успешного побега двое 
Dead by Daylight - это когда ты следишь, чтобы жертву не сняли с крюка, а люди этим временем чинят все генераторы и бегут к воротам 
Dead by Daylight - это когда ты отошел от крюка с жертвой на 10 метров, а ей в это время помогли сбежать 
Dead by Daylight - это когда ты играешь в прятки по-взрослому
Dead by Daylight - это когда поиграть с друзьями можно только в приватном лобби 
Dead by Daylight - это когда тебе наконец-то пригодились школьные знания английского языка 
Dead by Daylight - это когда Dead by Daylight выходит раньше, чем "Friday the 13th: The Game" 
Dead by Daylight - это когда фанаты Outlast испытывают оргазм 
Dead by Daylight - это когда нет надоевшего всем раннего доступа 
Dead by Daylight - это когда ты покупаешь готовый продукт, полностью оправдывающий свою цен
